title: Automobile Magazine Fonts
content:
What fonts does the magazine Road & Track use?

 [‹ It's a Pattyfab-ulous day!](http://web.archive.org/web/20081010003624/http:/typophile.com/node/41640 "Go to previous forum topic") [Akzidenz Grotesk versions and AG ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081010003624/http:/typophile.com/node/41683 "Go to next forum topic")
author: bobnadel101

comments.content: I don’t have that one lying around. :^P But aren’t they using [Stainless](http://web.archive.org/web/20081010003624/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=stainless&x=0&y=0)? (They are using it on their site in a few images.) Can you post some current examples?
